function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on smartphone applications for real-time health data could lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of the biosensor patches may lead to potential disease spread.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential interruption of supply chains and delivery of wearables due to lockdowns and disruptions","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about the battery life of smart wearables","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for the use of private data accumulated by wearables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile applications for covid-19 impact management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of blockchain technology for covid-19 apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using blockchain to associate people’s official ids with covid-19 status and movement permissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gis data for covid-19 mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of contact tracing data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for tracking covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gps for monitoring covid-19 positive patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The app may not accurately determine whether an individual has been exposed to a potential covid-19 patient, leading to false alerts or a lack of necessary alerts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns surrounding the use of gps technology could lead to public distrust and reluctance to use the app","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Voice-based covid-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disease surveillance and forecasting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for disease prediction without human interpretation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on ai for risk estimation of emerging infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for early identification of zoonotic viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of risk of infection, severe symptoms, and treatment outcomes using ai","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai predictive models may have accuracy limitations and may not always provide accurate predictions for severe cases of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing of ai tools for covid-19 screening and diagnosis may lead to errors and inaccuracies in test results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai-based multisensory technology for covid-19 screening may raise privacy and data security concerns for individuals being scanned.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of thermal face scans and ai-enabled cameras for temperature screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai-enabled medical imaging for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of unbiased data affecting ai model performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of testing kit development using ai","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential false positive or false negative results in covid-19 screening due to voice detection technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for accurate diagnosis of covid-19 mutations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False identification of potential drug treatments for covid-19 through ai analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of ai-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed availability of treatments due to extensive scientific checks and clinical trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai-driven drug discovery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
